title: Causeway Interview - Brian Tyree Henry
content: Brian Tyree Henry is one of those actors, you know? Always good in everything he appears in, whether it's Atlanta, Boardwalk Empire, How To Get Away with Murder, This Is Us, If Beale Street Could Talk or even Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse. He's just got that special X factor that lifts his characters up, and frankly, Ali may be a bit obsessed. Brian's getting rave reviews for his work in his latest effort, Causeway, and was kind enough to tell us all about it here...
